articles.title: Dan Da Dan season 2 coming next summer
articles.description: Momo and Okarun will return in July in the second season of Dan Da Dan.

articles.title: DC Comics’ best villain team returns with… Superman on the Secret Six?
articles.description: Superman, Dreamer, and Gossamer find common cause with Catman, Deadshot, and Black Alice in the newest Secret Six series from DC Comics.

articles.title: Hey, You Can't Shoot At Drones, That's Our Job: Feds
articles.description: The panic over drone sightings spiked laser strike incidents on planes by 269 percent
